EmailTemplate.subject: November Partner Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
In This Issue:
- Partner Discount: VDI Promotion
- Partner Town Hall Meeting
- Announcement: Turbonomic & The Opportunity Ahead
- Cloud Economics On-Premises With Turbonomic & HPE
Partner Promotion: VDI
VDI places significant demands on the underlying compute, storage and network infrastructure. Assuring end-users receive an experience equivalent to that of a physical desktop is a challenge. Turbonomic manages the significant resource demands and fluctuations which often stall VDI deployments by continuously assuring Virtual Desktops get the resources they need, when they need them.
Until January 31st, 2017, partners who bring Turbonomic to a customer with a VDI environment will receive an additional 10% discount on their Turbonomic list price. Simply register your opportunity in the Turbonomic Partner Portal to receive this offer. PLUS! Partners will receive an additional 10% off their transfer price on any subsequent deal that closes within 90 days of the VDI deal. <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3786]]>
Click here <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/docs/DOC-3960]]> for additional VDI specific collateral and information available in the Partner Portal.
What You Missed: Partner Town Hall Meeting
We held our annual Quarterly Town Hall Meeting for our partners last week on November 15th. During the meeting we made some exciting announcements about where we are headed as a company along with more information about our VDI promotion! To find out what you missed, watch the webinar here <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/3685588643754942980]]>.
Turbonomic & The Opportunity Ahead
Bill Veghte, former Microsoft, HP & SurveyMonkey Executive, joins Turbonomic as Executive Chairman. Veghte shares why he chose to join Turbonomic through the lens of a customer, a technologist and his own career experiences in his blog post here <[[http://bit.ly/2fonbRp]]>.
For more details, review the press release here <[[https://turbonomic.com/press-releases/bmc-and-turbonomic-partner-to-deliver-agile-application-optimization/]]>. Also see: Fortune Article <[[http://fortune.com/2016/11/10/former-microsoft-hp-exec-joins-turbonomic/]]>, Business Insider Article <[[http://www.businessinsider.com/why-two-tech-tycoons-joined-turbonomic-2016-11]]>.
Cloud Economics On-Premises with Turbonomic & HPE
<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-turbonomic-hpe/]]>
Turbonomic and OneView hosted a webinar on the state of the multi-cloud, cloud economics and the Turbonomic OneView Integration. The webinar also includes a customer case study and a demo. In case you missed it, watch the 50 minute webinar here <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wbnr-recrd-thank-you-turbonomic-hpe/]]>.
In the spirit of Thanksgiving, here at Turbonomic, we want to thank you for your continued partnership. From our office to yours, we wish you and yours a very happy and healthy holiday season! Welcome New Customers

Questions?
If you have any questions please email us at partners@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:partners@turbonomic.com]]>. We always appreciate your feedback so feel free to send us suggestions on how to improve our partner program or request resources that you would like to see.
